entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
